author: The Linux Foundation
description:
🚀 105% growth in OSPOs expected for small organizations in the next 2 years! Discover how Open Source Program Offices are reshaping innovation, security, and collaboration in the latest research from the 7th annual TODO Group's 2024 #OSPO report with LF Research. Don’t miss these insights! https://www.linuxfoundation.org/research/ospo-2024?hsLang=en

#OpenSource #OSPO #LFResearch
title: The 2024 State of OSPOs and Open Source Management
